data.title: Ma Wen Chao
data.meta_description: Ma Wen Chao (马文超); Chinese; Ma Wen Chao is an actor in Mainland China. He was born in Urumqi City, Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region and graduated from Urumqi
